entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a professor who has come to visit Riddle. He is described as smiling and making no reaction to Riddle's aggressive behavior.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is introduced as the person being visited by Dumbledore. He is described as looking wary and aggressive towards Dumbledore.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs Cole is mentioned as leaving through a door, implying that she may have some connection to Riddle or Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has come to visit Riddle, as indicated by the context of their conversation and body language.
Riddle is connected to Mrs Cole in some way, possibly as a patient or someone she is concerned about.
